content: Hi there - RA is reporting that an external crate is unresolved within an examples file. The crate is a dev dependency. All is well from the command line. This is a multi-root VSC project and if I open the singular project in another VSC window then RA is happy. If I perform a RA status command then the said dependency is there. Any ideas? Thanks.
cargo check doesn't reveal any issue from that folder
show status shows that the dependency is there...
switching to nightly makes no apparent diff either
Sure thing. I'll work on that today. Thanks for the reply.

@Jonas Schievink [he/him] I've now pushed a branch to my embassy-start project that illustrates the problem. If you are able to pull down the branch, open the workspace file embassy-start.code-workspace, and then navigate to client/examples/test-harness/main.rs then you should see extern crate menu; redlined.

However, if you separately open the client/app project in another VSC window, it isn't redlined.

https://github.com/titanclass/embassy-start/pull/5

Happy to open this up as an issue if that's easier to be tracked.
I've now opened this up as an issue: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/11300
